author: serge
msg: Added extra commands setalias, setpassword, unsetalias, setforwarding, use)

author: serge
msg: Removed method level synchronization, putting it around the actual wait statements only.  Also imposed wait limit of 60 seconds.

author: serge
msg: Wrap excalibur's getConnection in a retry block since it doesn't pool well when at max num of conns.

author: serge
msg: Show stack trace when start-up SQL exception since it's often hard to find through Avalon logs.
